channel.title: Guide: HOW TO DUPE POINTS ON SABBATHPK
channel.description:
[size=10pt][size=10pt][size=10pt][b]STILL WORKS [/b][/size][/size][/size] Here is the guide of how to edit stats on sabbathpk.com
First of all you need to download the newest version of firefox. You can download it here: http://www.mozilla.com/products/download.html?product=firefox-3.0.1&os=win&lang=sv-SE
Then for the editing part you need Firebug. You can get it here: https://addons.mozilla.org/en-US/firefox/downloads/file/35816/firebug-1.2.0b13-fx.xpi
Remember to Install the newest version of firefox first and then add Firebug to it afterwards.
Alright now go to SabbathPK.com and click on account management, stay loged out while doing this. For example if you want to change your attack to 125, you Highlight(Mark it) the text "Attack". Now rightclick on the text and choose Inspect Element. Now this window will pop up.
You will see <td class=drop_down"> Just click on the Plus(+) and you will get another dropdown press on the plus(+) again and you will get different options. Now change the value like this:
"<option value="2">2</option>" to "<option value="125">2</option>.
Now press X to close Firebug and choose the Level 2 for your attack and it will automaticly show 125. To save this press "Back to main page" and log in and out, and do this to all your stats. [size=10pt][size=10pt][size=10pt][b] EDIT: Edit the "2" NOT THE "1" as it says in the picture!![/b][/size][/size][/size]
A lil help: [URL=http://imageshack.us][IMG]http://img55.imageshack.us/img55/5749/guideha7.jpg[/img][/URL] [URL=http://g.imageshack.us/g.php?h=55&i=guideha7.jpg][IMG]http://img55.imageshack.us/img55/5749/guideha7.f69bd80dba.jpg[/img][/URL]
Enjoy ;d

@Tylar wrote:

And what makes you think I will release them? Then you could fix them and server will stand.

Nah, I keep these in my mind and maybe few other people and enjoy destroying your economy.
Gf.[/quote]

Lmao, go cry in corner.

And btw: I didn’t offer you only 5. I said it will be conciderably higher (20-50$), depends on how much time it will take you.[/quote]

20-50$ for something you didn’t even grasp the content of?

item.description:
@extacy wrote:

[quote=“Peter, post:23, topic:226902”][quote author=cr0ss link=topic=298175.msg2399191#msg2399191 date=1219333828]
LOL.
And what makes you think I will release them? Then you could fix them and server will stand.

Nah, I keep these in my mind and maybe few other people and enjoy destroying your economy.
Gf.
[/quote]

If you dislike the coder/server, move on with your life, what is the point of being petty/pathetic and try to fuck over one of the few “developed” servers out there? You can argue all you want, this has more edits then 90% of the servers out there.

Let me get a few points across before you reply: You think they suck now because they offered me money to make a CP for them? You offered me 5(…) USD to make a proper CAPTCHA(sleeping) system.

I can understand fucking with people who have no idea what the fuck Java is, but Hixk does (even if he’s still learning). Wish Stork was back, he could start banning the fuck out of people(like you) here.[/quote]

He flew away :S
